value:
Gahaha! Glad to take you under
my wing if ya want. Think of me
as your father, all right?

Fir? Where are you, Daughter?$k$pCAN YOU HEAR ME?
FIRRRRRRRR?

Listen up—lesson on battles...
Offense! Attack! Bwaaah!
Lesson's over.

What? Need me? I'm your guy.
Big lug, for lugging stuff.

Who needs a weapon with these
trained-up muscles? Bwaaah!
Yaahhh!

Oho! You! No doubt about it.
You're $Nu.
Good to meet you.

True power, right here. Bwaaah!
Yaahhh!

Mm-hmm! More of the good stuff,
right there.
Wha—?! But that's only—? Sheesh.

Aim high—then higher! That's the
true way of the warrior!

I'm Bartre—warrior type, if you can't
tell. Bwaaah! Yaahhh! How'd that
sound? Burly nuff for you?

So, I've gotten the sense that you
think I should be paying more
attention in battle.$k$pWhat, not just go in swinging?
That's what you should be
doing—swinging ALL the time!$k$pBwaaah! Yaahhh! All you need
is lefty and righty. We all got 'em,
so why not USE 'em?$k$pNo use complicating battle with
all that fancy stuff. At least,
not for me.$k$pNow, are we all good here?
Ha! Of course we are,
friend!
ふぅん！
ぬぅん！
うおおっ！
Not bad.
You fool!
Taking me on?!
I'll break your bones!
Muscle up!
Not here...
Bwahaha!
What, my turn? It's my turn, right?
Check out these arms! Bwaaah! Yaaah!
Ready to train? Then punch me hard, right in the gut.
You worried about something? C'mon, out with it.
Say no more. That look in your eyes says it all. You're a fighter.
A true warrior needs only his muscles—nothing else!
I'll take care of you. Like a father, I will!
Hmm!
Got it.
All right!
